title: Soundcore K20i by Anker, Semi-in-Ear Earbuds, Bluetooth Wireless, 36H Playtime, Fast Charge, Clear Sound, Comfortable Fit, ENC 2-Mic Clear Calls, Custom EQ, IPX5, Bluetooth 5.3, App Control (Black)

all_images.alt: Soundcore K20i by Anker, Semi-in-Ear Earbuds, Bluetooth Wireless, 36H Playtime, Fast Charge, Clear Sound, Comfortable Fit, ENC 2-Mic Clear Calls, Custom EQ, IPX5, Bluetooth 5.3, App Control (Black)

raw_desc: Extended Playtime: Enjoy up to 36 hours of uninterrupted music with Soundcore K20i. A 10-minute fast charge gives you up to 2 hours of playback, so you're always ready to immerse yourself in music anywhere. Crisp sound: The Soundcore K20i earphones feature a 13mm dynamic driver and innovative design, coupled with BassUp technology, ideal for podcasts. SEMI-IN-EAR COMFORT - With a semi-in-ear design and weighing only 3.5g, these wireless Bluetooth earbuds stay securely in your ears with no need for inserts, for a snug fit, lightweight and comfortable all day long. HIGH QUALITY CALLS - Soundcore K20i earphones feature AI noise reduction technology that precisely isolates your voice from background noise. Thanks to the dual ENC microphone, your calls are clear even in the busiest environments. Customized Sound: With 22 preset equalization settings and customizable equalization options via the app, these semi-in-ear wireless earbuds let you listen to music according to your personal taste.
